original_text: And it shall come to pass, as soon as the soles of the feet of the priests that bear the ark of the Lord, the Lord of all the earth, shall rest in the waters of Jordan, that the waters of Jordan shall be cut off from the waters that come down from above; and they shall stand upon an heap.
korean_text: 온 땅의 주 여호와의 궤를 멘 제사장들의 발바닥이 요단 물을 밟고 멈추면 요단 물 곧 위에서부터 흘러내리던 물이 끊어지고 한 곳에 쌓여 서리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
as soon as the soles of the feet of the priests
that bear the ark of the Lord
the Lord of all the earth
shall rest in the waters of Jordan
that the waters of Jordan shall be cut off
from the waters that come down from above
and they shall stand upon an heap
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 물은 더미 위에 서 있을 것이다
